data.text: And he gave me advice that ended up being the best advice

data.text: I've ever heard given to a comedian.

data.text: He said -- He said, "Don't move to New York until you're good."

translation.text: Anh ấy nói - Anh ấy nói, "Đừng chuyển đến New York cho đến khi em khỏe."
